laboratory_examinations.findings: Creatinine level is 1.0 mg/dL (reference range: 0.9-1.1 mg/dL), within normal limits.

The liver is homogeneous in echotexture without focal mass identified. The main portal vein is patent. Intrahepatic bile ducts are within normal limits. Common duct measures 3 mm. Gallbladder is unremarkable. The pancreas is grossly unremarkable. The spleen is not enlarged measuring 7.2 cm. The left kidney measures 10.6 cm with no hydronephrosis. The right kidney measures 11.8 cm with no hydronephrosis, but shows a wedge-shaped area of increased echogenicity likely representing a small parenchymal scar.
